review: I love not having to put my laptop next to the tv and hooking up hdmi cords to play stuff on the tv. I have never owned a roku or any other streaming device so when i found this at it's cheap price I wanted to try it out. If using one of the supported apps it does not tie up your computer. I can play shows from netflix and not have to have it running full screen. The only time you have to run full screen is Chrome mirroring which I had read and expected. Great little device, very easy set up.Set up is really simple and in a matter of 10 minutes you're up and running. What I really like about Chromecast is that once you set it up its done, that's it! You name your device and no more back tracking or resetting.
author: Johnny Molina

review: Have been flinging TV shows from apps on my android cell phone to chromecast to watch on my HDTV. It's so easy and so great, I find it hard to believe it's so inexpensive.

review: I had initially bought a chromecast when they first came out for the exceptional price, but now I bought a used one for almost half the cost and its still a steal! I have a Belkin N150  router  (separate review) that works with the device half the time, unfortunately for me it seems to like to disconnect from the internet but still broadcast wifi. The chromecast is a fantastic device when you have a good home infrastructure to support it as I used to have!
